info.name: Intrepid Museum - Mobile
info.description: Huge responsive upgrade for Intrepid Museum website. Beta.
info.additionalInfo:
Better layout for mobile devices.
Completely refactored design.
Full <table> website has been converted to responsive layout.
Touch adapted controls - arrows, links, buttons.
Better MAP (Google static maps API) and real liveview camera shot (provided by LiveCam service (camera temporarily offline))
Work in progress - only some of the internal pages converted to new layout, stay tuned!
